steps.1: add-Measure 1/8 teaspoon of salt and add it to the mug
steps.2: Sprinkle-Sprinkle dried Italian herbs inside the mug
steps.4: spread-spread marinara sauce around the surface of the batter
steps.5: Microwave-Microwave for 1 minute 20 seconds, or until it rises and the toppings are bubbling
steps.6: add-Measure 4 tablespoons of flour and add it to the mug
steps.7: Add-1 tablespoon of olive oil to the mug
steps.8: add-Measure 1/16 teaspoon of baking soda and add it to the mug
steps.10: Mix-Mix the contents of the mug thoroughly. (There might be some lumps, but that is ok.)
steps.11: Stir-Stir the contents in the mug well
steps.12: Sprinkle-Sprinkle 1 generous tablespoon of mozzarella cheese on top of the sauce
steps.13: add-Measure 1/8 teaspoon of baking powder and add it to the mug
steps.14: Add-Add in 3 tablespoons of milk to the mug
